feed.title: Category: Downton Abbey | MECHAkunEX Media Diary

entry.title: Downton Abbey - Season 1 - Episode 3 - Episode Three
entry.content: This episode was appalling! I can't believe that Mary would really act that way, especially when her virtue had just been established beforehand. This seems like a case of modern writers putting modern loose morals into the past inappropriately. I do find it very believable that Matthew would be more attracted to Mary when he was ignored. I wonder if we are to believe that something sinister is behind the Turk's death?

entry.title: Downton Abbey - Season 1 - Episode 2 - Episode Two
entry.content: This was fun. It felt like an example of what all the episodes will be like because it had a very well scoped out plot. It was interesting how they were able to communicate Matthew's distaste for aristocracy, but his partial acceptance of it at the end.

entry.title: Downton Abbey - Season 1 - Episode 1 - Episode One
entry.content:
I've been hearing a lot about this show and my wife was very interested in it. Normally I try to stay away from shows that are not completed, but I made an exception because she was so interested.

The first episode was very cool. They've laid out a lot of thick plot and interesting characters. I quite like it.
